name: ShowWidgets™Christmas
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: show widgets christmas
des:
Get the most of your smart display with Christmas widgets from ShowWidgets™.

Try:
- Christmas Countdown: Count down the days 'til Christmas showing a new picture each day.

Follow the instructions in the skill to find and install any of the quality widgets:
1. Find ShowWidgets™ widgets in the Widgets Gallery by swiping from the right side on your supported Echo Show device
2. Tap the widget to learn more
3. Tap the "Add Widget" button

The widget will be added to your Favorite Widget panel.

It's that easy.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
